uk.ac.ebi.ep.mm.app

Class Uniprot2DiseaseParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.ep.mm.app.Uniprot2DiseaseParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MmParser

    public class Uniprot2DiseaseParser
extends Object
implements MmParser
    Class to parse the file - either HTML or tab-delimited - containing a table of equivalences from UniProt accessions to OMIM IDs and MeSH terms.
    Author:
    rafa

      Parses the UniMed file and stores in the mega-map the xrefs from UniProt accessions to OMIM and MeSH terms, but only if the scores is equal or greater than minScore.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Parses the UniMed file and stores in the mega-map the xrefs from UniProt accessions to OMIM and MeSH terms, but only if the scores is equal or greater than minScore.
        Parameters:
        args - see CliOptionsParser.getCommandLine(String...)
        Throws:
        Exception - in case of error while parsing.

      • getFields

        protected String[] getFields(Uniprot2DiseaseParser.Format format,
                 String line)
        Splits the fields in one line of the file, namely:
        • [0] - UniProt accession
        • [1] - MIM number(s)
        • [2] - MeSH ID(s)
        • [3] - MeSH heading(s)
        • [4] - Score(s)
        Parameters:
        format - the Uniprot2DiseaseParser.Format of the file.
        line - one line read from the file.
        Returns:
        the split fields in the line, or null if it is a header line. Note that multi-valued fields must be split further.

      • setWriter

        public void setWriter(MegaMapper mm)
        Description copied from interface: MmParser
        Sets a writer to make the mega-map persistent.
        Specified by:
        setWriter in interface MmParser
